_header: When might and will and right were one
Subjects: evils of the times; sermons, verse in
_description: Evils of the times — two couplets

BLHar4894.Transcription:
When myght and will and ryght wer aneþen was welthe in ilk a
                    waneBot sen myght want will and ryghthase ben sorow day and
                    nyght
